submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCuts: List[int], verticalCuts: List[int]) -> int:
        m -= 1
        n -= 1
        ans = 0
        m_idx = 0
        n_idx = 0
        horizontalCuts.sort(reverse=True) 
        verticalCuts.sort(reverse=True) 
        h = 1
        v = 1
        

        while m_idx < m and n_idx < n: 
            if horizontalCuts[m_idx] > verticalCuts[n_idx]: 
                ans += horizontalCuts[m_idx] * v 
                h += 1
                m_idx += 1
            else: 
                ans += verticalCuts[n_idx] * h 
                v += 1
                n_idx += 1

        cur = 0
        
        while m_idx < m: 
            cur += horizontalCuts[m_idx] 
            m_idx += 1
            
        ans += cur * v  

        cur = 0
        while n_idx < n: 
            cur += verticalCuts[n_idx] 
            n_idx += 1
        ans += cur * h 

        return ans
